property.name: Card Text
property.value: Superstar Ability: When your maneuver is reversed you may RFG Backlash 1 card; if you do, do not draw for Stun Value, and then continue your turn. Your Ax Kick is F: 0, +2D, and Unique. You can pack High-Flying Style and Tree of Woe Double Stomp, and Unique Multi maneuvers, but you cannot pack maneuvers that are Chain, Heat, or Volley.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Replace a Superstar listed on your NXT Women's Championship Title Belt with 'Kairi Sane'. When you look at your opponent's hand, you may choose 1 maneuver and put it under The Pirate's Treasure. When he successfully plays a maneuver, you may look at his hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When you end your turn without playing a maneuver, put all cards under this card into your opponent's hand. He must discard 1 card to play a card with the same title as a card under this card. Once during each of his turns, he may swap 1 Hand card with 1 card under this card. Once during any turn, you may play 1 of his cards from under this card as if from hand; if you do, discard 1 card and then after damage is applied, or when it is reversed, put the played card into his hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: This card is considered a High Risk for your From The Top Rope. Can only be played after a 5D+ maneuver. Cannot be reversed from Backlash. If this card is reversed from Arsenal and you continue your turn, continue to apply damage as if it were not reversed. After damage is applied, end your turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Once during each of your turns, you may RFG any number of Hand cards and then draw the same number of cards. You can pack No Sell Maneuver and Good Golly, Miss Molly Holly, but you cannot pack Denville, New Jersey or Dallas, Texas.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your maneuvers without a reversal restriction from a card are +#D, where # is equal to the number of your RFG cards; when you have lower Fortitude, they are also +2 Stun Value. Your opponent's maneuvers are -1D. When you RFG cards for your Ability, put up to 3 of those cards on the bottom of your Arsenal instead. When you overturn damage from your opponent's non-Superstar-specific reversal, you may put the same number of your RFG cards on the bottom of your Arsenal.

card.name: How Do Ya Like Me Now? - Throwback

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be blanked. When your Fortitude Rating is 5- and you have 10+ RFG cards, your opponent cannot play D: 0 reversals (except Restricted Use in this Area and Sustained Damage) to your non-Run-in F: 0 maneuvers, and when they are unsuccessful, put them in your hand instead. When your Fortitude Rating is 10+ and you have 5+ RFG cards, and your maneuver is unsuccessful, you may RFG that card and then put up to 2 RFG cards into your hand. When you have 5- Hand cards and you use your Ability, double the number of cards drawn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As a maneuver, when you have 15F+ this card is -#F, where # = the number of your RFG cards, and your opponent must RFG the top # Arsenal cards in order to play reversals to it (max 6). Once during each of your turns when this card is in your hand, you may reveal it, and then put this card, 1 random RFG card, and up to 1 Ringside card on the bottom of your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: WWF/WCW Legend Superstar Ability: Your 'Suplex', 'Knee', 'Breaker', and 'Driver' maneuvers are considered to have 'Classic' in the title. Your Managed by Bobby 'The Brain' Heenan is Superstar-specific, and when you look at your opponent's Arsenal for that card, you may arrange his cards in any order and then he overturns 1 card. You can pack No Sell Maneuver and Classic Leaping Knee. Your printed Superstar-specific cards are also WCW.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your 'Piledriver' maneuvers are Trademark Finishers instead, and their Fortitude and Damage cannot be reduced. When you are Harley Race, once during each of your turns you may reveal 1 Hand 'Classic' maneuver, put it on the bottom of your Arsenal, and then play 1 Ringside 'Classic' maneuver as if from hand.

card.name: The Greatest Wrestler on God's Green Earth

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be packed when packing There Is No Escape. Cannot be blanked. Your 'Classic' maneuvers are Superstar-specific, and -2F and +1D for each of your Ringside 'Classic' maneuvers; when unsuccessful, you may draw 1 card. ACE: When your opponent successfully plays a maneuver, you may RFG this card from your Ring, and then his played card is D: 0 and blank until the end of the turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played after a successfully played maneuver or as a Counter. When you have 5+ lower Fortitude and this card is F: 0, or when played after a 5D+ maneuver, can only be reversed from Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: NXT Superstar Ability: When your first maneuver played each turn does not have a printed reversal restriction, your opponent chooses # random Hand cards, and your card cannot be reversed by the chosen cards, where # is the number of cards under Moonrise. The number of cards he discards for your effects is reduced to 1. You can pack High-Flying Style. Replace a Superstar listed on NXT Women's Championship Title Belt with 'Ember Moon'.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your opponent cannot prevent you from playing your Superstar-specific Pre-match cards, and they can be played from Ringside. When your first maneuver successfully played each turn does not have a printed reversal restriction, you may put 1+ cards under this card into your Ringside, and then put up to # Ringside cards on the bottom of your Arsenal, where # is the number of cards moved to Ringside +2.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be blanked. Arsenal Search 1 card and put it under Moonrise. Once during each of your turns, you may put 1 Hand / Ringside card under Moonrise. When your maneuver is successful, your opponent overturns 1 card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played after a successful maneuver, after From the Top Rope, or as a Counter (10D+ maneuver). When you have 4+ cards under Moonrise, cannot be reversed from Backlash. When you have 8+ cards under Moonrise, cannot be reversed from Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Superstar Ability: Your 'Chop', 'Kick', and 'Kendo' maneuvers are considered to have 'Dynamic' in the title for your effects. Your 'Dynamic' maneuvers are considered to have 'Chop' and 'Kick' in the title for your effects. You can pack His Hands and Feet Are Lethal Weapons, Educated Hands (it is Unique), and Series of Kicks as if they are not Smackdown. You cannot pack The House That Hardcore Built.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your 'Dynamic' and 'Luck' Backlash cards and actions are Superstar-specific, and your 'Educated' cards are Permanent. Your 'Dynamic' cards cannot be reversed by Shoot Counter, and when your opponent plays a non-Superstar-specific reversal to your 'Dynamic' cards, it deals a maximum of 1D and he puts 1 random Hand card on the bottom of his Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As an event, this card is F: 0; at the end of the Pre-match phase, put this card from your Ring into your Backlash, and then Arsenal / Ringside Search 2 'Kendo' cards. As a reversal, ignore any reversal restrictions and reverse any non-Superstar-specific card with a reversal restriction from your opponent.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When played as a Counter, cannot be reversed by hybrid reversals. As an maneuver, cannot be reversed from Arsenal by Unique reversals. As an action, this card is F: 0, put this card and up to 1 Ringside card on the bottom of your Arsenal; when you have lower Fortitude, this card cannot be reversed.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: WCW Superstar Ability: Before your Draw Segment, your opponent reveals up to 3 Hand cards (min. 1); during your Draw Segment, draw up to 3 additional cards, minus 1 for each revealed card. When he reveals 3 cards, he randomly discards 1 of those cards. You can pack Cheater and Fan Favorite cards, Once a Horseman, Always a Horseman and High-Flying Style. You are a Hart Family member.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When you play a maneuver, you may overturn 1 card and your maneuver is considered to have 'Shoot' in the title; when you RFG a card for Straight-Shootin' Interview, you may put it under this card instead. Once during each of your turns, you may choose 1: put 1 Ringside card under this card; OR RFG 1 Ringside card and then either put 1 card under this card on the bottom of your Arsenal, or you may play 1 card under this card as if from hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your Pre-match Capacity is +4. When your opponent reveals cards for your Ability, randomly choose one of them. When the revealed card is a maneuver, you may ignore 'Can only be played after...' text on your first High Risk this turn; when it is an action, he can not play reversals to your first Set-up action this turn; and when it is a reversal, shuffle up to 1 random Ringside card into your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be blanked. 'From' Set-up cards can be played from Ringside. ACE: Once during each of your turns, you may put 1 Hand card under The Loose Cannon, and then when your next card played this turn is a High Risk, ignore the 'Can only be played after...' text, and your opponent must RFG 1 Hand card to play reversals to it. When you have equal or lower Fortitude, this effect cannot be reversed.
